articles.author: ASHRAF KHALIL
articles.title: Comedian Kevin Hart joins an elite group honored with the Mark Twain Prize for American humor - The Associated Press
articles.description: Kevin Hart rose from the open mics and comedy clubs of his native Philadelphia to become one of his country’s most recognizable performers. Now Hart has received the Mark Twain Prize for American Humor, accepting the award Sunday night at the Kennedy Center f…
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) Kevin Hart wiped away tears on stage as he looked up from the bronze bust on a pedestal to the trio of comedy legends who had come to witness his professional highlight.

articles.title: Girl buried under rubble rescued after 16 hours as storm kills at least 12 in Brazil - DAWN.com
articles.description: The deluge came as Brazil, South America’s largest country, is suffering through a recent string of extreme weather events.
articles.content: Search teams in southeastern Brazil rescued a girl buried for more than 16 hours in the rubble of a collapsed house, following a powerful storm on Friday that has so far claimed at least a dozen live… [+3045 chars]
